entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #50480
  • Building ASP.NET Core from source fails with an error (MissingMethodException System.Text.Json.JsonDocument System.Text.Json.JsonDocument.Parse) #50479
  • NavigationException raised when using NavigationManager.NavigateTo upon form post in SSR #50478
  • Can't find the {project}.styles.css file, when using the Blazor Web App template create a .Net 8.0 (preview) application. #50473
  • Faild to load {Assembly}.styles.css with a specific route in .net 8 Blazor Web App #50471
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json #50470
  • Welcoming a new member to our Community Triagers group #50469
    Discussions

Closed

  • Provide a solution for sharing authentication state of a user in a Blazor application with client #49626
    8.0-rc1
  • Perf improvement: json #50434
  • Dynamically-added SSR content breaks if it includes script tags #50424
    8.0-rc2
  • HttpLogger does not log RequestBody #49063
    8.0-rc2
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware does not log RequestBody when body is consumed by copying to another stream #49989
    8.0-rc2
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #31844
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor localization (translation) does not work with multiple languages #50361
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features for .NET 6 still in a preview mode #50472

PullRequests

Created

  • [Do not review] Break LoadFromStoreCert to detect test failures #50485
    area-networking
  • [release/6.0] Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50484
    area-mvc, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50483
    area-ui-rendering, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50482
    area-ui-rendering
  • Add SetBrowserRequestStreamingEnabled extension method #50481
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `460ae98` to `8a6feab` #50476
    area-infrastructure
  • Update CertificateLoader.cs #50474
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Document the coupling between KestrelServerLimits and *TransportOptions #50468
    area-networking

Merged

  • Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50467
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • Merge property attributes with parameter attributes for AsParameters #50458
    area-minimal, 8.0-rc2
  • Suppress nullability warning when resolving JSON body or service #50410
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix exception handling for complex form mapping in minimal APIs #50444
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix corrupted streaming SSR output #50380
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix local build file modification #50387
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix scripts in SSR updates #50453
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix pRequestInfo INVALID_POINTER_READ caused by GCs (v7 backport) #50448
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-networking, 7.0.12
  • Fix pRequestInfo INVALID_POINTER_READ caused by GCs (v6 backport) #50447
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-networking, 6.0.23
  • Fix outputcache bug when using IOutputCacheBufferStore #50455
    area-infrastructure, area-networking, 8.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6f6ab42` to `8a6feab` #50477
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.12
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6f6ab42` to `8a6feab` #50475
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.23
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Ignore properties without public setters during form mapping #50318
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc2
  • Make MapIdentityApi DTOs public #50247
    area-identity, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • [Blazor] APIs to preserve content between enhanced navigations #50437
    area-blazor
  • [SignalR] Error if multiple service attributes are on a single parameter #50248
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc2
  • Persist Prerendered State #50373
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Form mapping support for select multiple, logging, DataMember and other improvements/cleanups #50431
    area-blazor
  • Tidy up aka.ms links in data protection error messages #50465
    area-dataprotection
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50422
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2258018 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Split redis output-cache pieces from Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchange.Redis into Microsoft.AspNetCore.OutputCaching.StackExchangeRedis #50457
    area-middleware
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
    area-networking
